attributes.additional_details:
Most of gp practice  have appointment system .and they dont have enough slot opens to see emergency  patients .when hou are not well  if you call your gp they always say sorry we dont have apointments  today .and all emergency  slot  is full too .so patient  have no option then going a@e .unnecessary  delaying accident and emergency  to there locol hoapital .so please changed this system and ask all gp practice  to leave extra emergency  slot open .
Thanks

rejection.details: GP services are commissioned by NHS England.  Neither the Department of Health nor the Government plays any part in this process.
